history.narrative: Law 15-265, the “CareFirst Economic Assistance Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-75, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 9, 2004, and December 7, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 3, 2005, it was assigned Act No. 15-650 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-265 became effective on April 5, 2005.
